directions: Freeze honeydew in 1 layer in a large sealed plastic bag until frozen, about 4 hours.
Blend honeydew with cucumber, yogurt, mint, and sugar (to taste) in a blender until smooth. Thin with water if necessary.
ingredients: 1 1/2 lb piece ripe honeydew, seeded, rind discarded, and flesh cut into 1/2-inch pieces (3 cups)
title: Honeydew Cucumber Smoothie
